item.title: CVE-2022-1059|2024-09-17T02:36:41.708Z -- aethon -- tug%20home%20base%20server
item.description: Aethon TUG Home Base Server versions prior to version 24 are affected by un unauthenticated attacker who can freely access hashed user credentials.
